Title: Includes care and services provided by a child advocacy center under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients
Summary: Includes care and services provided by a child advocacy center licensed, certified, or otherwise authorized by the office of children and family services under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to including care and services provided by a child advocacy center under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients
